participant_1.background:
My pets are a source of endless inspiration for my writing.
I have a house with a home gym so my kids can visit me when they want.
i am the youngest of 4 children.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.
I remember dancing to the music of Katy Perry in my room when I was younger.
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
it is my universe , and everyone else is just a character in it.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you. How about you?
Doing well, thanks! I am excited to talk to you about your custom upholstery shop.
Oh, that's great! What would you like to know?
Well, first of all, what inspired you to start your own shop?
I have always loved working with fabric and furniture. I started out making custom slipcovers for my own furniture, and then I started getting requests from friends and family.
That's awesome! What's the most challenging part about running your own shop?
The most challenging part is finding the time to do everything. I have to work on the shop, take care of my family, and still find time to have fun.
I can imagine! But it sounds like you're doing a great job.
Thank you! I'm trying my best.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel, read, and spend time with my family.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests! I'm sure you're very busy.
I am, but I love it!
Well, I'm glad to hear that.
It was nice chatting with you!
